name: Navatar Group
tag_list: cloud-computing, saas, salesforce-com, force-com, financial-crm, financial-services-crm, salesforce-for-financial-services, private-equity-crm, hedge-fund-crm, capital-markets-crm, force, force--com, backstop, protrak, tnr, nextround, pivotal
overview:
Navatar Group, a premier salesforce.com partner, is a global firm providing Cloud Computing consulting and solutions. Founded by veterans of Deloitte Consulting, Navatar brings development and go-to-market expertise on the Force.com Platform and has helped several companies and ISVs develop and launch On-Demand products in North America, EMEA and APAC. Navatar Group is headquartered in New York, with offices in Washington, D.C., London and New Delhi, India. Navatar’s Offshore Technical Excellence Center in New Delhi, India provides customization and implementation services for SaaS solutions.

Navatar brings Wall Street experience to Cloud Computing. A leading provider of Force.com applications for the financial sector, Navatar provides salesforce-based CRM solutions for equity capital markets, debt capital markets, banking, mutual funds, hedge funds, private equity and mergers & acquisitions, that are ready to deploy with minimal customization.
